page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STELLA
page.content: I woke up at 7.30am,got dressed and ran downstairs to have my breakfast of cereal and tea.About 8.30am I picked up my coat and schoolbag and called for Alison.It took us ten minutes to walk to school,and at 9am I began work by reading my library book.Then I did Maths and finished with Handwriting. At break we all went out to play.I had a packet of sweets.After break I read Elidor and then wrote an adventure story until lunch.In the afternoon we played non-stop cricket and finished with some quizzes.When I got home I had a drink of lemonade.At 6pm I had my dinner with my family.After that I watched a James Bond film called Dr No on the video before going to bed.
